containers_title: Cytosolic carbonic anhydrases (CA-I and CA-II) Activity
Cytosolic carbonic anhydrases (CA-I and CA-II) Activity

reference_pointers.pl_string: PON1 is sensitive to oxidative damage. Many studies have reported the correlation between PON1 enzyme and several cancer types such as bladder49, prostate50, lung51, gastric52, and ovarian53.
